name: Notability Note File
summary: Learn about .NOTE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: NOTE files can only be created or opened by Notability. You can create NOTE files by selecting File → Export and choosing the Note format. You can open NOTE files by selecting File → Import and navigating to the NOTE file.
NOTE: Notability is typically used by business professionals, teachers, and students. Besides NOTE files, Notability can import .RTF and .PDF files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
